tags.sentence: Failure is the mother of success.
tags.author: Thomas Paine

tags.sentence: None is of freedom or of life deserving unless he daily conquers it anew.
tags.author: Erasmus

tags.sentence: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity. So let us seize it, not in fear, but in gladness.
tags.author: R.M. Nixon

tags.sentence: Living without an aim is like sailing without a compass.
tags.author: John Ruskin

tags.sentence: Towering genius disdains a beaten path. It seeks regions hitherto unexplored.
tags.author: Lincoln

tags.sentence: Fear not that the life shall come to an end, but rather fear that it shall never have a beginning.
tags.author: J.H. Newman

tags.sentence: Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value.
tags.author: A. Einstein

tags.sentence: You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret of success.
tags.author: Charles Chaplin

tags.sentence: Pursue your object, be it what it will, steadily and indefatigably.
tags.author: famous person

tags.sentence: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
tags.author: Mattin Luther King
